dcterms:description: A semi-synthetic benchmark paired dataset for lens flare removal, comprising 5,000 scattering flare (SF) and 2,000 reflective flare (RF) images, which can be integrated into existing natural image datasets for training.
dcterms:title: Flare7K

dcterms:creator: Yuekun Dai
Chongyi Li
Shangchen Zhou
Ruicheng Feng
Yihang Luo
Chen Change Loy
dcterms:description: A dataset that combines synthetic and real images for nighttime flare removal, enhancing the training process by utilizing optical center symmetry prior.
dcterms:title: Flare7K++

dcterms:creator: Xuaner Zhang
Ren Ng
Qifeng Chen
dcterms:description: A dataset used for single image reflection separation, which provides a basis for training models to separate reflections from images.
dcterms:title: Flickr24K
